data.actual_result: "Verified" isn't centered and has two extra pixels above the word
data.short_description: "Verified" in the verified tooltip in mutual servers isn't centered on 110 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to mutual servers with someone you share a verified server with and hover your mouse over the verified icon - Observe the "Verified" in the tooltip - Change your zoom level to 110 - Go back to mutual servers and hover over the verified icon - Observe the "Verified" in the tooltip
